Reviews.Title: “What Sinks The Titanic”
Reviews.Author: marlinwebster
Reviews.Content: The Titanic Taksim is an excellent hotel. The facilities are brilliant, the rooms are spacious and well finished an furnished Â and the shower makes it difficult to not luxuriate for just a bit longer. Further highly commended is the spa, gym and mini-Hamam in the lower levels of the property. Where the Titanic does sink, pardon the pun, is in its reception. I found the reception staff to be particularly unfriendly and less than helpful, there was a particular gentleman at reception who was incredibly impatient, so much so that we tended to avoid him. I imagined that it could be a language issue but I also take it that we were not the only English guests to stay at the Titanic. This was certainly the one issue that tainted the experience. I will be heading to Istanbul again later this month, the Titanic is still on my list of hotels to look at, I'm hoping that my experience was a fluke, but as a contingency I will not to be booking my full stay there. Overall though a good hotel in the Taksim area.

Reviews.Title: “Fine hotel, great location in a great city”
Reviews.Author: MkTrekker
Reviews.Content: We stayed here two nights while we did a quick tour of Istanbul. (We'll have to come back again.) The room was comfortable, the service great, and the breakfast bar was the biggest and broadest I've ever seen (at least 15 m).

Reviews.Title: “No aircon!”
Reviews.Author: PauAraos
Reviews.Content: Apparently this hotel is famous for not having sufficient airconditioners for the rooms. My family rented three rooms and all three had busted AC. It was ok when we opened the widows, but the drunks on the street below kept us up the whole night. Cleanliness had a lot to be desired as well as I found an empty pack of cigarettes under the bed when we first checked in.

Reviews.Title: “A bit below Average actually”
Reviews.Author: FGOB
Reviews.Content: The rooms were tiny and there was nowhere to upen a clamshell suitcase except on the bed. The view was the window of an adjoining hotel a few metres away and the internet was useless.

Reviews.Title: “Almost excellant”
Reviews.Author: JrModerator
Reviews.Content: + Very good and modern hotel, comfortable room, clean and quiet. Safebox in the room, no credit card required to use it. Great breakfast with a variety of things to choose from. Excellant location. - No bathtub, just shower in most of the rooms. Air Condition just goes from 0 to MAX.

Reviews.Title: “titanic...disaster”
Reviews.Author: telis
Reviews.Content: stayed there for 3 nights with my wife.this hotel has been already booked for us by the company which held a congress in constantinople so we did not had the chance of choosing another hotel which definatelly would not be this one or any other titanic hotel. check-in was let's say o.k., room was bit small but was in general well equiped. it was rather cold because the room temperature did not rise enough through the central heating system so the individual heating control panel was practically not much...to control.in the bathroom the in-ceiling light was always falling and we had everyday to call the maintenance for repairing it-apparently not in a good way and always they made a lot of time to come.room service was poor and one afternoon while we were sleeping they came to pick up the tray even though we had the do not disturb sign on.the staff did not speak good english and mnost of the times communication was very difficult plus they were rude most of the times.one day when we returned from sightseeing i noticed that the room was over-smelling of my cologne-aparently the housekeeping liked it a lot and most probably used it ...a lot!there was coffee making facilities but not even once were replaced,the bed was not bad but not great either, the pillows cheap feeling and the covers too. the bed linen of cheap quality.soundproof was so-so.the towels were old and worn out and bathroom amenities of the worst (turkish...)quality.first morning in breakfast even though we booked the room including breakfast they said it was not included and we had at least 30 min. to solved it out , the reasons due to bad english from them, bad booking system of the hotel, rude and unhelpful staff.breakfast was very turkish in taste, quality and variety so not much left to be desired.we had to wave our hand or wait at least 20 min. before coffee to be served of course with no smiles or at least an apology.the spa was extremely expensive for massages for such a hotel.the whirlpool's water was somewhat dirty and the pool's temperature was colder than it should be so we did not swim at all.everywhere there were used towels thrown on the floors etc. general appearance of the lobby- restaurants-bars was o.k. with a fake feeling of luxury.they had a ...fake security booth as you entering the hotel the one that they are using in the airports-definatelly this was simply for decoration! if i ever stay in this hotel again?certainly not and definatelly i will never use titanic chain of hotels again.

Reviews.Title: “Central location, modern rooms and good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Relaxism
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to Istanbul. A magnificent city with a wide selection of attractions. We picked Titanic City Hotel through TripAdvisor and we didnâ€™t regret it. The rooms are modern and very clean. The hotel is located in a quiet pedestrian street in Taksim. We just took the airport shuttle bus (EUR 5 per person) running every 30 minutes, which was very convenient and dropped us less than 100 meters away from the hotel. Excellent choice if you want to be in center of all the action and away from the noise. Staff was friendly and professional. Istanbul is a great city to visit for site seeing, historical attractions, and best shopping in Europe.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good One In Center Of Taksim”
Reviews.Author: Kevork_1980
Reviews.Content: I just felt myself home in the hotel but there is no exciting view you just see the old buildings arround you buts its near to the istiklal street and this is a big plus something bad that you cant watch all satellite chanels because you have to pay for this you just can watch the local channels enjoy it :)

Reviews.Title: “i got inlove....”
Reviews.Author: joseph a
Reviews.Content: i was been staying there for five days..the place is very convenient where ever you wanted to go..good rooms,nice foods and very great employees..when i go back there i would choose this hotel again..

Reviews.Title: “good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: shital r
Reviews.Content: This is a good hotel for the price.. The breakfast is the best part. I have stayed in different hotels in Istanbul, but the breakfast that this hotel offers is incomparable. It close to Istiklal, but a bit far from the grand bazaar or sultanahmet, but there are good connections to various tourist places from here. There are lots of small restaurants and shops at walking distance from Titanic. Staff was very good and helpful, and rooms were very clean.We also enjoyed at the spa and swimming. If travelling from Ataturk then this hotel is not that far (taxi charges around 25 euros).. In all a very good experience..

Reviews.Title: “lovely hotel....great staff”
Reviews.Author: Paula G
Reviews.Content: my husband, 12yr old son and I stayed at the Titanic in september 2011. My husband was there for a conference close by which was the reason for choosing a hotel near Taksim Sq.This hotel was very comfortable and clean with a spacious very nicely decorated room. The room was very quiet at night. The staff are extremely pleasant and helpful. The rooftop bar is a lovely spot for a drink before bed. Breakfast was fabulous. Huge buffet and delicious eggs cooked in front of you. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Really like the location, hotel is very new and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Virag K
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the unfortunately named Titanic hotel for 10 nights on my trip to Istanbul so felt like this was home for me. I loved the location of this place. It's within a 5 minute walk of Taksim square and Istikhlal street, which is the heart of the new city. The hotel is quite new I think so the facilities are fantastic. They have a Turkish bath in the hotel and have a spa as well. The rooms are very comfortable with an awesome hot shower and very comfortable beds and Hugh speed Internet. There is also the added benefit of watching Titanic on channel 3 on a 24 hour continuous loop. Only complaint is the service is not great. Overall, liked this place a lot.

Reviews.Title: “4 star superior”
Reviews.Author: LukeOnTheRoad
Reviews.Content: New, impeccably clean, luxury furniture, spacious suite apartments at the top floors. Note that standard "superior" rooms are smaller. Breakfast buffet is very good, yet not somptuous. The only remark is that they don't replenish used complimentary items, such as fruit and teabags that you find in the suite the first day.

Reviews.Title: “The most unpleasant experience”
Reviews.Author: pellyma
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Titanic City for 7 nights and were a company of 5 (2 couples and a friend). The hotel is new and modern, we picked it among dozens in the area for that reason, allthough it wasn't the closest to Taxim square and Istiklal and was pricey. Our rooms were ok, (not so spacious for 2 people - the one for single use had only a small window higher than usual). Lighting was very poor, sometimes sewage smell came from the toilet and some towels were old and had stains, closet had 4 hangers only and a small safe. Some nights we could hear club music coming probably from the street, but all this did not bother us so much. Breakfast had a variety of things, but in some days bread products were not fresh. The bar on the roof was awfull, depressing, no view, dark, with a big tv showing football... and no music. The gym and spa area were small, we used it only once since the "hamam" (full of fat semi-naked men looking at women...yuk!), sauna and shower were communal for men and women! Private massages were very expensive. Our stay in this hotel ended badly, when the last day, during our brief absence for breakfast hotel staff robbed us. They took our wallet (no money, but driving license) and mobile phone. We ended up spending our last holiday hours talking endlesly with receptionists and managers, watching cameras, explaining... All this time their attitude was unfriendly, almost hostile and cold. We never heard a sympathetic word, or a simple "we are sorry". They even charged us for a small bottle of water we used from the mini bar (after all this mess we forgot to buy from outside...)! We wanted to call the police for fingerprints (we have seen 2 people entering our room twice without cleaning it, as they did to all other rooms) and they agreed but they said that police only interrogates both sides. We then decided we had no time for this, it was our last day... After pressure, they agreed to refund us 1 night stay the next day in our credit card. We were a bit relieved, (our loss was worth more than this) but it was a compensation and could make us forget our turmoil. If only we had known... It proved they only wanted to get rid of us, since they never refunded a cent !!! This was the most ennoying part. It is supposed to be a 4 star hotel, professionalism, integrity, honesty and hospitality should be absolute standards. Instead they tricked and befooled us... All this mess and dishonesty ruined our impressions and left bad memories we are trying to forget. It is so unfair for us but also for Istanbul...

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value for Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Antalya_10
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in several hotels in Istanbul and Titanic has been the best so far, in my price range. We got an online offer which seemed very good but after staying in this hotel for 3 nights we found it a great deal.Location is perfect...just on Taksim, near the Havas Bus Stop (service to airport), Metro, and many restaurants nearby. Don't miss the oportunity to eat in 'Udonia', the Japanese Restaurant nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Best location and very clean”
Reviews.Author: mehdi55
Reviews.Content: I was there from 22th November till 4th December and it was so clean and comfort for those that like everyday going to Istiklal stretet.Bathroom is modern and very clean also a room and the staff is very polit and friendly,just the room servise is some poor. Location is 100 meter it means just walk 1minut to taksim square and Istikal street that all is live till midnight.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but cold room”
Reviews.Author: philippe7888
Reviews.Content: Very clean and modern hotel. We slept in a small suite. Friendly staff. Food ordered through room service was good. The spa is nice, very clean and attractive with welcoming staff. The massage (for an extra fee) was very overpriced and not good quality. Another negative point: the room was cold and nothing was done to heat it... This explains the lower grade, otherwise I did not observe any other flaws in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, well-located hotel”
Reviews.Author: legacy99
Reviews.Content: Stayed here during a 3-night stay in Istanbul prior to setting off for a 3 1/2- week tour of the country. Room was pleasantly located with a nice view across the city. Breakfast buffet was outstanding, with a good selection of local and international food. With the exception of one receptionist refusing to tell me where I could go to buy bottled water because there was bottled water for purchase (!) in the mini-bar, the staff was friendly and helpful. ( I managed to find my own sources to buy water and had no trouble bringing it in to the hotel in my jacket pocket.) Hotel location was good: walking distance to Taksim Square and (pedestrianized, with lots of shops & restaurants) Istiklal Street. Only downside: after arriving at the hotel around noon after an overnight flight from New York,, we were told that our rooms wouldn't be ready until 2 PM. The hotel did, however, serve tea and coffee while we waited. Either the travel company or the hotel dropped the ball on this one. WiFi was free and worked well in my room

Reviews.Title: “Nice looking but not soundproof”
Reviews.Author: quintel
Reviews.Content: A very nice looking hotel in a new part of the city, centrally located near the Taksim square. The rooms are spacious and very nice equipped with a quality bed. The disappointing fact is that the walls and windows are not soundproof. You hear everything from the next rooms and the city noise. I will not come back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Good Location”
Reviews.Author: ldwheels
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located near Taksim Square which has plenty of shopping and restaurants nearby. Transportation is also available at Taksim Square to other parts of Istanbul. The hotel was nice and the people congenial. Wifi coverage was not that great and I had to be in the lobby as I could not get reception in the room. Breakfast was very good. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: Dann58
Reviews.Content: This is not a bad hotel, but not great either. The good points about this hotel are: its location, at the quiet end of a mostly pedestrianised area off Taksim square; the overall design and decor is modern and works well; the breakfast offers a great range of food; overall the staff are friendly and try to be helpful. What lets it down is the details you don't see on the internet, which make it less than a 4 star in my opinion: very poor soundproofing between rooms (if you enjoy listening to your neighbors talking, hanging up their clothes, moving their furniture around and their crying baby this is the place for you!); the quality of bed linen and towels is poor - sheets thin and torn, basic towels; the aircon worked but only on a very cold, high fan setting; the tea, coffee and water in the room are not replaced after the first night, even if you happen to be there for several days; there is no concierge or information service (for example, the front desk "guest relations" personnel seemed to be unaware of the Istanbul Modern art museum just down the hill at Tophane or the Istanbul Biennal, which was on when I was there). There are a number of hotels of a similar rating in this area, superficially this one looks the best and is relatively expensive, next time I would try another.

Reviews.Title: “very good choice”
Reviews.Author: AthensBmw
Reviews.Content: Brand new hotel, strategically situated in the Taksim area that is within walking distance. Only negative (minor) is that light in the room is rather weak for reading or working with computer. Service is quite good and wireless internet is free of charge. Very good choice basis value for money. I stayed between 10-15 Oct 2011.

Reviews.Title: “Awful hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Lugansk
Reviews.Content: Awful hotel. Very noisy and dirty. In rooms it is smoked. The personnel badly speaks on German and English. I do not know turkish language, excuse. In hotel you will always try to deceive and shortchange

Reviews.Title: “a good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: MonaLebanon
Reviews.Content: this is my first choice hotel in Istanbul, which i visit almost every month.The hotel is very close to the touristic area of taxim, and yet it is away from the noisy part of this area.This hotel is easily reached from the 2 international airports in Istanbul by the Havas buses that drive every half an hour and cost only 10 TL. for one way drive.The team is very friendly and helpful.The rooms are very well organised and very clean not forgetting the bathroom which i really like.The beds are very comfortable and very clean. And i think that breakfast is the best part of ur stay,where u'll cerainly be enjoying the good food of Turkey. I do recomend this hotel as a 5 star hotel rather than a 4 star one.

Reviews.Title: “Good Luxury Hotel in European Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: SaifIqbal
Reviews.Content: Location & Getting there: Five minutes away from Taksim square. (1) Take the metro from Ataturk Havaliman airport (itâ€™s a single line there). Interchange to the tram line at Zeytinburnu and take the tram towards Kabatas and get down at the end there. Once you get down from the tram, exit, and transfer to the â€˜Tunelâ€™ metro/tram that will take you to Taksim Square. Go towards the McDonaldâ€™s on one of the arteries of Taksim, and LaMartin Caddesi (street) will be opposite that. A two minute walk down the end of the street will get you to the hotel. Cost will be 6 TL/person (3 modes of transportation). (2) Easier way is to take the Havas Airport shuttle. It costs 10 TL/person and will pick you from the airport and drop you at Taksim (again in front of McDonaldâ€™s). Total journey time till be 45 minutes by Havas. Staff: This is a 4-star rated hotel so the staff, including the bell boys, were thorough professionals. We did have a small problem one night when we wanted some cutlery to be sent up and it took an hour and a visit to the front desk to get it done. There was also another guest who was displeased about something â€“ maybe in the night they get short staffed, something you do not expect in a star-rated hotel. Room: Standard Double Room. The room was like any typical 4/5-star standard room. Adequately spacious with a closet, a sofa, etc. Televison system was advanced but there were few English channels (the movie â€˜Titanicâ€™ played in a loop). The bathroom was modern and good. Room was both functional if you were not going to stay in much as well as one for relaxation, especially if you plan to make use of the spa. Other Facilities: The hotel has an excellent spa. The free facilities include a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, steam bath, and a Turkish bath. These are well maintained and not too many guests were around, so they can be used in leisure. View: None to speak of. Meals: Breakfast was not included in our tariff so we did not take any meals at the hotel. At EUR 10/person it was still expensive and since you are in the heart of the city, you can find cheaper alternatives everywhere. Things around: Since this is the modern part of Istanbul, I will not recommend staying here if you are looking to do more things around the Sultanmehmet area. Taksim square is the hub of all night activities and a long walk along the Istikal Caddesi off Taksim is highly recommended. There is also a multi-story mall on the street. Area has a feel of New York, with lots of boutique cafes, eateries, shopping places around. To take in some history, you need to walk downhill from Taksim towards Besiktas, until you hit the Bosphorous. You will find the Dolmabache Palace to your left. This tourist attraction should not be missed. Guided tours leave every 30 minutes and walk you around only some of the rooms and halls of the 300+ rooms in this palace. You can also get great views of the Asian side of Istanbul from here. Eat & Shop: Taksim square has a lot of standard fast food joints as well as eateries. You can always grab a doner (wrap) at one of the small eateries. Shopping will be expensive here as there are a few shops dedicated to local trinkets and arts; it is better to buy those from standalone shops near Sirkeci/Sultanmehmet (Grand and Egyptian Bazaars are also a rip off). Tips: 1. Do not need a taxi if you are going to hang around near the hotel and Taksim area; cab to Karakoy on the Galata bridge should not cost you more than 10 Liras. 2. To take tickets on the metro/tram, you would need Jeton tokens (1 token = 2 Liras = 1 trip on Metro/Train/Tunel). Machines are near the stops and take both paper and coins; 3. There is an Istanbul Museum pass that is valid for 48-72 hours that gets you cheaper entry into museums (we did not know about it until later).

Reviews.Title: “wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: noelle a
Reviews.Content: we had an excellent stay at this hotel, it seems like it is a 5-star hotel and not a 4-star hotel. It is so clean, so quiet, the breakfast was very good. The location is perfect just in the middle of the city, in Taksim. The staff is very kind and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “titanic city hotel istanbul”
Reviews.Author: biancaBeirut
Reviews.Content: good location excellent service the titanic city hotel is located in the strategic tourism area [taxim] we stayed for the third time at this hotel from 5sept.-11sept.this year.we choose it evry time we travel to istanbul because we feel good ,breakfast is good,reception people helpful,all in all,we were very happy for that we prefer to go to this hotel and we make our reservation 2 months prior our arrival in order to guarantee a room especially in high season .we recommand it to all my friends and busniess travellers

Reviews.Title: “Great as Four stars property”
Reviews.Author: Joelle R
Reviews.Content: I was there between October 6th and October 9th.I was really impressed by what i saw.It was exceeding my expectations specially that im an executive Housekeeper.Hotel Staff are very helpful and professional specially Burak from Front office.Housekeeping are well trained because Hotel was clean and they went extra miles when they arranged my bed in a very well designed way that i really liked!AC problem was solved immediately and up to guest satisfaction.But from an expert point of view,old stock of towels should not be mixed with new stock when servicing an occupied room same as a rubber gask is needed arround shower area glass in order to avoid water leakage to the floor while taking a shower.Hotel location is great,clean,free of dust.Shower areas walls are really ncie.Rain showers are an added value for the property.Guest services are fast and Bellboys are very helpful.Some rooms views are bad but they can not do anything about it cos it's a building structure.I strongly recommend:)

Reviews.Title: “Great spa, spacious rooms, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: up_the_juncti0n
Reviews.Content: The hotel location is a 5 min walk from Taksim square; there is little to do in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. This is the only negative aspect, and not an issue for those that don't mind the 5 minute walk. The desk staff were polite, helpful and efficient. The room was spacious, very clean, with an immaculate, beautifully designed bathroom. The breakfast buffet had a good range of hot food (eggs, omelettes etc.), cereals, cheeses, fruits and breads. The rooftop bar/restaurant was very quiet when we went in, but the staff there were very accommodating. The best advantage of this hotel is its spa. Hotel guests can use the pool, sauna and steam room for free (mixed sex). They also offer reasonably priced massages and quite invigorating turkish baths. I'd definitely stay here if visiting Istanbul again.

Reviews.Title: “very nice again”
Reviews.Author: TONIREINE
Reviews.Content: I visited TITANIC HOTEL CITY TAKSIM a second time during this summer I was in 15 June and I return with a group of 6 friends again to Istanbul to TITANIC HOTEL. This hotel is still the same and even better I was there between 22 September and 25 September 2011 in room 1918. It is a wonderful room with a very nice view ,spacious, clean, noiseless , free internet connection, very nice breakfast with a lot of variety every day .from the concierge Murat who was very helpful to all the staff our journey was good. Very quick check in and check out. The hotel is near Taksim Square next to Istiklal Street to metro station .the shuttle to the airport is 10 TL one way it stopped 50 meters 2 minutes walk from the hotel. Nice restaurants and shops near the hotel, exchange office and all major international food court. Take care do not buy a map for Istanbul from the reception price is 10 TL outside the hotel the same map is for 3 TL. Arriving to Istanbul our agent tried to change the hotel for one night to Nippon hotel we refused cause after checking the rooms in Nippon Hotel we found them very dirty it smells very small even the toilet are not clean We come back to titanic and we stay as it is once again wonderful. tonireine

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: Imos
Reviews.Content: Amazing hotel very close to taksim area, just loved it amazing staff very clean rooms, breakfast wonderfull, i recommend to every traveller, ;)

Reviews.Title: “clean, modern suite”
Reviews.Author: dr-dom
Reviews.Content: Reasonably priced modern hotel in the Taksim district. Booked a regular room but was upgraded and given a suite with kitchen, living room, balcony, bedroom and bathroom. Nice furnishings and very spacious feel. Very extensive breakfast selection. Helpful staff. Free wifi. Got a reasonably priced pre-booked taxi from AtatÃ¼rk airport to the hotel via <airporttaxiistanbul.com>, although it's also possible to get a bus from the airport to Taksim square, which is close to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, well managed, great location”
Reviews.Author: Friendofganesh
Reviews.Content: Very happy experiences at this hotel. They gave me an early check-in, clean, modern, quiet room, free wi-fi, they don't charge a ridiculous amount for telephone calls from the room. And a terrific location. All in all highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “If you wonder what hotel in Taksim to take, take this one”
Reviews.Author: Aethelred
Reviews.Content: The Taksim area abounds in hotels, and it is difficult to choose one. I wound up with and in the Titanic City and was not disappointed at all. Thus, if you want to stay in this area, I would recommend the hotel very highly. The main reason for this, and for giving it 5 points, is that you really get ***** quality at **** price. The lobby and restaurant are just okay, but the rooms are really *****, in furniture, size, and amenities - such as bathrobes and slippers. Nice large writing desk, perfectly working free wifi, a view of Asia (7th floor). I especially enjoyed the spa area, which is nicely done and maintained and which features - unusually - a pool that is small but still large enough to swim laps, and a sauna, steam bath and a hamam. All were free, which is unusual, and perfect in ambiance and decoration to relax. The staff was friendly and professional. The hotel is at the end of Lamartin st., so not as close to Taksim as some others, but it's really less than 10 minutes to the metro, and the walk to Taksim is pleasant. There are cheap convenience stores just seconds from the hotel entrance, the neighborhood is safe, and taxis, Havas airport buses, the historical tram to TÃ¼nel, the funicular to the main tram, etc., are less than 10 minutes away as well. If staying in Taksim, I would definitely stay here again. One thing: I would definitely not book the airport shuttle the hotel offers - I did it this time for convenience, but there wasn't any. It was â‚¬ 59 which is double that of the regular yellow cabs even if they try to, well, correct the price a bit upwards; the pickup person was almost half an hour late (and nobody to reach and check); and the driver mistakenly crossed the Bosphorus because he thought I was staying in another Titanic hotel. Oh well, a nice if brief trip to Asia! :-) Back I took a normal taxi because it was raining; otherwise, as I said, the Havas airport bus, which is just â‚¬ 5, is less than 10 minutes easy walking away from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in a nice area”
Reviews.Author: Steinbrenner
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a wonderful time in Turkey and The Titanic City in Instabul was a wonderful way to start. The groups were great and the bar/restaurant were wonderful. Our room had a city view, but we could see the bridge connectind Europe and Ais and it was beautiful at night. If you want a hotel on the water, this is not the hotel for you. However, it was only a 10 minute ride (no traffice) to the Bosphorus and dinner on the island in the middle. It was also only 10 Turkish Lira. Breakfast at the hotel was also very nice with a lot of different choices every morning. If you like to shope there are a tone of shops about a 10 minute walk away and a great wine bar up the street from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: nowelt
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, lovely rooms and bathroom. Breakfast was great, roof bar was also very nice, nice view of the city. Walking distance to Istiklal street and dolmabache palace. Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “I liked this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Daniello76
Reviews.Content: we stayed in this hotel first week of july , it is a new hotel , close to istiklal street but away from noises, we asked for high floor room and we got it, although not much view, but make sure to ask for a room that is front view otherwise you will end up in a room facing the wall of the neighbourhood hotel. Reception service was very good, except the time we checked in , we asked to have an upper floor room they told us we have to wait until one room gets ready in one hour, so we agreed, but when the room was ready no one called or informed us (although we were sitting at hotel lobby which is not very big), they waited until we check with them. Otherwise they were very helpfull regarding booking for restaurants . room was very good, clean but the very big disadvantage is the TV channel which were very limited, and if you want any additional channel you will have to pay for it. and the only movie you see on the limited channel is TITANIC which was repeatedly showing for 4 days:) Breakfast buffet was very good . And as far as Taxis the hotel is located on backstreet road not very crowded and the Taxi can drop you at the front door of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “lovely impression and will be back”
Reviews.Author: Agy_10
Reviews.Content: Pity we spent just two nights but I was impressed with the remarkably clean room and sparkling bathroom. My room was more like a 5 star. Oh! the stunning roof top view of istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: vivetsandys
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at a number of hotels in downtown Istanbul and have been generally unimpressed - not this time. The room was big by the standards I've come to expect in Istanbul and the interior was very modern. I'm not sure if I was in a standard room, I doubt it because of looking at other reviews, because our room was exteremly spacious and the bathroom was huge (and spectacular). The hotel location was a short walk to Taksim and the Metro station there. Overall I was pleasantly surprised by this hotel and would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel sure we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Rollamasri
Reviews.Content: We stay in Titanic city hotel for 4 nights it was perfect in everything starting from stuff & not finished by the little things . the stuff was sooooo helpful , know english very well .. The rooms was so nice , small a little , but so comfortable ,bathrooms was modern , a variety of breakfast let you dont know what to choose . it's far a little from traffic & noise and in a very close area to taksim & istiklal street which you can find a variety of restaurants americans , turkish and whatever you need . it should be a 5 stars hotel . i loved this hotel and we'll be back each time i visit istanbul . Thanks to all in Titanic City specially Ollen & Burak :)

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD AND EXCELLENT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: TONIREINE
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my wife in a business and leisure trip for four nights in room 1608 this hotel is very nice clean no sounds around near taksim square and the main attraction of the city . from the concierge to the breakfast and the rooms you can feel yourself in your home first and in a 5 stars value . check in and out very quick. 3 elevators. spa. and the 11th floor is something to see . i really will come again with my family

Reviews.Title: “A very good hotel near Taksim”
Reviews.Author: AFDMumbai
Reviews.Content: This was my second visit to Istanbul. I reached the hotel on a cold morning in January. The reception was very friendly and I had no problems checking in. The room was nice, big and comfortable. The room was warm so despite being 7 deg outside I had no problems in the room. The shower in the bathroom was the best amongst all the hotels I have stayed till date. The location was very good with lots of good turkish restaurants nearby.Overall I enjoyed the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: hrassai
Reviews.Content: Titanic Hotel is very well located! There is lots to do around the hotel! Many good joints to eat food! The breakfast here is very good with a large variety. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Very good and clean rooms. They have a nice indoor swimming pool!

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nicky025
Reviews.Content: Perfect Location. Nice rooms, friendly staff; Excellent Breakfast in terms of quality & Variety. I Highly recommand this Hotel ...

Reviews.Title: “Very good but could be better”
Reviews.Author: Waleed_Essam
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 5 nights with my wife during our Istanbul trip April 2011. Booking was based on tripadvisor reviews as usual. The Good things about the hotel: 1- Staff are polite and helpful 2- Breakfast is simply excellent 3- rooms are clean / bathrooms are excellent 4- close enough to Taksim but away from the noise 5- Booked room only and was offered free daily breakfast The not so good (why only 3 stars): 1- rooms are very small, my deluxe room was very small and just enough to move around, couldnt imagine how small normal rooms will be 2- furniture and interior are very dull & tasteless 3- Honestly for the price, I know I could have booked a better hotel, this price anywhere in Europe will give you really good trendy hotels. 4- room service lady knocked and opened the door once without checking if someone inside or waiting for us to open 5- trash bin in room was not emptied once although full, and complimentary coffee/tea bar not refilled 6- the bed is seriously small, for a couple it's barely enough, for me since I'm 190cm (6'10") tall it's not confortable Don't get me wrong, the hotel is really very good, and I have no real complaint about it, it's just that I'm not staying in it again, nor recommending anyone to it because I've seen more trendy and interesting options during my visit for same/less prices.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel next to Istiklal street”
Reviews.Author: Thalie000
Reviews.Content: Titanic city hotel is a great hotel if not the best in istanbul. 2 mins walk from istiklal street main shopping street in istanbul and 1 min walk from the metro station. Nice, clean decrorated room. friendly staff, the breakfast had a wide choice of hot and cold choices. Free internet connection from your room or from the computers available at the hotel on 6th floor. From the hotel you could see a nice view over the bosphorus bridge. We would recommed this hotel to all poeple traveling to istanbul to they won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: “very good”
Reviews.Author: pcc10
Reviews.Content: nice,comfortable hotel,very good service. Breakfast was good also.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rofaida
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel 3/nights. I loved it the beds are wide and comfortable but the pillows is not good. The breakfast is very good and delicious. I Recommend it and if i will visit Istanbul in the future i will stay in it. :)

Reviews.Title: “Feel like home”
Reviews.Author: MustaphaEido
Reviews.Content: Whenever I plan to come Istanbul the first hotel comes to my mind is the Titanic City Hotel in taksim area. Nice rooms good breakfast beautiful spa ,nice gym and never forget the restaurant on the 11th floor with a spectacular view of the posphorus .. A very warm welcome you get since you put Your first step at the entrance .. A very talented staff excellent service and a sweet smile that goes directly to your heart gives the feeling that you are home now

Reviews.Title: “An enjoyable Stay Here!”
Reviews.Author: Rahi-banoo
Reviews.Content: Its a brand new hotel whit high quality materials in the rooms,very clean and comfortable beds.Amenities in the room include sleepers,bathrobe,kettle for tea- coffee,complimentary fruits and water.Personnel were guite helpful and polite.breakfast was great with variety of foods(salads,eggs,cheeses,hams,fresh fruits to select from. Certainly meets standards for a 4* hotel. No need to take your car to visit Taksim Sq,Istiklal St. and shopping centre of Osmanbey and Sisly.metro and Bus stations are 2 minutes on feet. Of course there is always space for improvements.The internet exploler and the key board should be in english for visitors.The spa center was not good.the steam sauna smelled fuggy and the turkish bath was not clean.the pool was small and not deep enough,also the jaccuzi was not hot and water should be changed more often.the staff of house keeping didnt know any english.Keep on improving your services.

Reviews.Title: “New, modern and fresh environment andeExecellent service”
Reviews.Author: ArashBz
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with my wife and my 6 years old son, during 4 nights. My wife is from Turkey. We received excellent service during check-in, with laugages and after arriving at the room a short presentaiton of the facilites. The first night we tried one of the restaurants recommended by the hotel (Kebab House) and I would not recommend the restaurant, since there are many other good restaurants with a lot better value for the money. The interior of the hotel is nice and modern and the service is greate. We woke up late for breakfast one morning (15 minutes before end of breakfast) so my wife and son stayed at the room but the servant at the breakfast buffet encouraged me to pick their breakfast and go and get them :-) Good breakfast bufÃ© and nice bars at the top floor and athe lobby. The Hotel has a perfect distance to the Taksim avenue just far enough from the traffic noise. The view from the room is not mych high business or residence buildings and not very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SolyTehran
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights in Titanic City. The front desk staff were very nice, we arrived at Hotel at 1oAM and they said we can check in the room in 10 min and offered up tea and coffee while we were waiting for the room to be prepared. The room was nicely decorated and clean, Breakfast was also good. We enjoyed our stay. If you want to be close to Taksim Area I recommend this Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic and Very Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: HappyTraveller213
Reviews.Content: A four star hotel a few minutes from Taksim plaza, right in the new area of Istanbul. Very nice room with big marble bath, flat screen TV, safe deposit box, mini bar, i.e. all the amenities of a high end hotel. I would like to point out the fantastic and helpful staff of this hotel, very professional and always willing to help you and make you feel comfortable. Upon arrival, once I checked in, I was given several brochures of Istanbul activities as well as a map and brief explanation of the area. Once I was taken to my room, I was shown how to use the safe deposit box, TV, and all the other gadgets in the room. I was also greeted with a nice little welcome fruit basket. I loved the room, it was perfect, exactly what I expected form a nice hotel. I canâ€™t point out how helpful and friendly the staff of this hotel was. Be it a restaurant recommendation, what places to see, or just taking a taxi, each time I would ask, someone at the front desk would spend quality time to explain to me in details. When I asked what places to visit, they explained to me the highlights of the city such as the Topkapi palace, Aya Sofia, the Basilica Cistern. They would call the places to make sure they are open and there was enough time for me to go. The staff also made me aware of the big taxi scams and to be careful. They told me if I ever had a problem with the taxi driver, for example, if I felt the fare was too high, I should not pay, ask the taxi to wait and call one of the hotel staff to clear things up. I wanted to visit a Turkish Hamam, but after reading so many negative reports about the big Hamams being tourist traps, I asked the Hotel staff for advise, on my last day. They recommended a nice classic Turkish Hamam in the Taksim neighborhood, about 15 minutes walk from the Hotel. What a pleasure this was, I was so happy to get the traditional Turkish Hamam treatment on my last day. Congratulations to the excellent team at Titanic. I will be back and can highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “its an amazing hotel”
Reviews.Author: faf0u
Reviews.Content: this hotel is the best hotel i have ever sean if u go to istanbul stay there believe me ull be realllyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy comftarble there the service is really good and the rooms are really tidy and the loby too its a good advice from me go there and ull enjoy it to the max

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomodations & service”
Reviews.Author: gmp46
Reviews.Content: Close to Taksim Square. Modern, clean. The staff is very helpful. Pleasant neighborhood. A bit too far to walk to the tourist highlights of Istanbul, but the hop-on-hop-off bus and other transportation are just 5 minutes away in the square.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Myrza313
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very well located. Clean. Friendly staff. Walking distance from Taksim Square. Liked it a lot.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel value tucked away from Taksim clatter”
Reviews.Author: Sport5639
Reviews.Content: Great value without the buzz of Taksim. Comfortable, clean and good breakfast spread. For good restarants, clubs and shopping at the Pera District, you are near enough, without the noise. I will stay here again if I had to come back. If there was more concierge service -- I believe they could you use more as they seemed overwhelmed, I would have given them an excellent rating.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel - it's location - is the perfect place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: rdeguisto
Reviews.Content: We were able to walk many places. We shopped, had lunch and inner within blocks of the hotel. The Staff at the hotel was excellent, especally Ipek GÃ¼nes. She helped with our tours and daily activities. Very nice young lady!

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel on our tour”
Reviews.Author: FoggMurphys
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from a 6 night tour of Turkey's ancient sites finishing with 3 nights at the Titanic. It was the best of the 3 hotels we stayed in. It is centrally located in the modern part of the European city close to Taksim Square and is a modern, well run, bustling hotel. The rooms are well appointed with comfortable beds, muted furnishings and expensively tiled bathrooms. Our only gripe with the room was that the air conditioning had been turned off (and the wires disconnected), presumably because it was thought that at this time of year it would not be needed, but as the weather was warm we found the room very hot and had to sleep with the window open. Our room also opened onto an air shaft with other windows on the opposite side so there was virtually no daylight. However this didn't really matter to us as we had a hectic schedule and spent very little time in the room anyway. Breakfast was buffet style in a pleasant dining room and there was a chef there cooking eggs to order, which was nice. All in all a very nice hotel and we would probably stay there again although for preference we would look for a hotel in the old part of the city.

Reviews.Title: “titanic city hotel in taksim istanbul is great value for money”
Reviews.Author: biancaBeirut
Reviews.Content: we have just returned from 6 nights stay at titanic city hotel very nice hotel with friendly staff especially ipek gunes guest relations ipek alwas made time to talk to us and seemed very happy in her work she advise us to visit bebek and kurucesemeh it was a nice area we both did enjoy the stay and it was a nice relaxing week

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay in a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: ggasmar
Reviews.Content: My parents stayed at Titanic City hotel for their 36th wedding anniversary. Everything about this hotel is great. All the staff persons are polite, helpful & professional. The hotel is new & its decoration is stylish. The rooms & their bathrooms are very clean. The bed mattress is very comfortable, a thing that you absolutely need after a long day of sightseeing. The breakfast is rich tasty & diversified. The hotel is 5 minutes walk to Taksim square & 10 minutes to Istiklal street which is an interesting place for shopping. My parents would recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of visiting Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Ipek helped us a looooooooooot”
Reviews.Author: fm_grafic
Reviews.Content: i had too much fun in Titanic hotel and recommend everyone visit there and feel that every thing is perfect ,for example the situation is near to subway and taksim and it is possible to go any part ...... also the breakfast was so nice , the other thing that i want to say is the special behavior that ipek had with us. she was sooooo friendly and patience guiding me to visit most of the shopping centeres and the nice islands and going to far distance places from the map by different transportation ,she could manage her time to answer and help all guests whenever we had question. i hope i can go there again....

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Time, Stay & People”
Reviews.Author: AbdullahBeirut
Reviews.Content: Spent my Honeymoon in Istanbul and stayed at the Titantic. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. They recommended great places to visit and lovely places to eat. In house entertainment and facilities were new and up to date. More importantly I felt like I was on holidays but also felt like I was at home.

Reviews.Title: “''very gracious welcome'' tolis-alex/poli”
Reviews.Author: tolis35
Reviews.Content: very polite and helpful staff! very positive reference I would make the Ipek Gunes''guest relation'',smiling and happy!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: paulBeirut
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel with great location close to Taksim square , the service is great , breakfast is generous , and they have lovely staff ,especially the public relations personnel . i recommend strongly this hotel for Istanbul visitors.

Reviews.Title: “It is a good hotel with the best location in Taksim sq.”
Reviews.Author: AzitaArash
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in a fantastic place, only five minutes walk to Taksim Square and Metro station. The hotel is clean and tidy, breakfast is good. I recommend to have lunch and dinner outside, as there are fantastic restaurants in Taksim district which have very delicious Turkish food. I don't recommend the hotel Turkish bath. The guest public relation is wonderful. What she recommends to the tourist as sightseeing tours are wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “good”
Reviews.Author: shirinazzz
Reviews.Content: I had been there for 5 days .... it was good hotel .... very beutifull ... very clean ... and staffs were polite and helpfull ... there were guest relation whos name was Ipek .. she helped us a lot and she was really helpfull and looked freindlly ... but the quality of food was not good enughiut ... I got diariya by eating dinnet in 11 th floor of the hotel ... it wasn't fresh ... and sezar salad was really owfulll .. and the price of food wasn't reasonable...

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Guest Relation Service, Fantastic Location, Highly Recommended for Business or Leasure,”
Reviews.Author: JO788
Reviews.Content: For our First visit to Istanbul,Titanic City Hotel was recommended among other hotels by our travel Agent. We selected the Titanic City Hotel, based on the reviews, the location and the price. "Excellent choice" was our agent's comment. We are not disappointed at all. In fact we are glad to share our good experience. We arrived at the Hotel frustrated after a long wait at the airport for our luggage that was missing. While sitting in the lobby upon arrival, an elegant lady with a bright smiling face approched us and introduced herself as the hotel guests relations officer. Ipek Gunes, immediately realized we have a problem as we looked tired and frustrated, she asked if she can do anything to help. Once she realized what happened, she immediately was on the phone contacting the airport, the airline company, travel agent etc. Our luggage that was supposed to arrive a couple of hours later in the next flight never arrived. Since then, every hour, she was on the phone trying to locate our lost luggage and updates us on her findings & reassuring us. Every morning she greets us with her lovely smile "Don't worry" enjoy yourself, have a good day. I am confident I will find your luggage very soon. We consulted her on places to visit, restaurants, shopping venues and directions. Her recommendations and guidance were fantastic as the restaurents she recommended were excellent, very good food at very reasonable prices. She highlighted on the city map she provided, simple, easy and clear directions on how to get there using public transport. As a matter of fact we spent the whole Holiday without luggage and we had to do with only the few items we had in our carrry on. However, Ipeck's assistance, continuous support and encouragment made our stay much more ejoyable, relaxing and made us forget our lost luggage which was found still sitting waiting for us at the airport of our departure.

Reviews.Title: “the bessst hotel in the world”
Reviews.Author: nohawt
Reviews.Content: so cosi so cute .....reallly he is so nice i like it to much u see ur dream inside ....the service ,the pool ,the food,the room......allll is the best:)

Reviews.Title: “BEST HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Boof11
Reviews.Content: Great hotel that had magnificent staff they upgraded us to one of the best rooms i have ever stayed in

Reviews.Title: “GREAT location, Lovely ambiance, Clean, Comfortable, Excellent Guest Service Desk!”
Reviews.Author: SuzanneJarrar
Reviews.Content: The hotel provided excellent value in a good location near Taksim Square. Taksim features lots of restaurants, bars and shopping and is a lively place any time of the day or night. The hotel is located close to metro if you want to travel to the touristic sights; this is a real plus as the metro is 2 minutes away from the Hotel. The Hotel was clean, modern. Staffs in general were friendly; however, I would certainly always remember the nice lady at the Guest Service Desk, Miss Ipek GÃ¼neÅŸ. She is very friendly, very helpful and has lots of information about every sight which you might think of visiting. She speaks very good English and she is very generous with her information and time . I would say that Miss Ipek made our stay in Titanic and Istanbul special ,because of her help we were able to go almost everywhere without having to have a tour guide with us. The rooms are comfortable, with A/C and TV. The free wireless Internet access in the hotel was very welcome. The Breakfast buffet was very good. I will sure recommend this hotel for friends and family if they choose to stay in the Taksim area in Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Worthwhile”
Reviews.Author: sha8z
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in a fantastic place, it is literally a five minute walk to Taksim Square and the Metro station. The hotel is clean and tidy, breakfast is average and i would recommend probably eating somewhere outside as their are alot of restuarants in the area. We used the Metro to go everywhere, it is easy to use and goes nearly everywhere. Once we made a mistake of taking a taxi to a shopping mall which cost 45 lira (22pounds) on the way back we only paid 1.50lira (75pence) on the metro which was one line to Taksim Square. The only bad thing about the hotel in my opinion and Turkey in general is the lack of English spoken. The hotel front staff seemed to speak OK english but the cleaning sstaff and conceirge did not. If I ever went to Istanbul again (probably not) would stay at this hotel. Oh and i wouldn't use the swimming pool it was really dirty.

Reviews.Title: “Central location, trendy decor”
Reviews.Author: nfs001
Reviews.Content: This is a very functional, stylish hotel near Taksim - perfect for a short stay, very stylish rooms (top marks for the very trendy bathrooms) and close to all the major sites.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Taksim”
Reviews.Author: Atlanta3452
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel, just one block from Taksim. Even if you're visiting Turkey for the first time- I recommend staying in Taksim- it is so much fun and where all the Turkish people hang out. I don't do the bar scene and it's still fun. The hotel is a block north of Taksim, on a quiet street. It is clean, modern with helpful staff. I led the trip, so didn't pay for my room- it may be a bit pricey, but it is reliable. Great breakfast. Spa downstairs- I would recommend going to a more traditional Turkish bath. The concierge is very friendly and will help you find what you need.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and great service”
Reviews.Author: cillegio
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent hotel in hotel quarter Talimhane at Taksim area. There are 20+ hotels in this area and the abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops makes this an ideal location for an hotel. The service in the hotel was great, staff was polite and courteous and the rooms are clean. Breakfast was very good; Wifi internet was free; bathroom is clean and modern. There is a lot of cafes right opposite the hotel and it is a good chance to have a very good local breakfast. I tried Yam-Yam and Riva couple of times for breakfast and was not disappointed. There is a lot of restaurants within 2-5 min walk from the hotel - Turkish traditional, fish, indian, japanese etc. Stay away from O'Yes fish restaurant as they are cheating with the bill ... Olta Balik is a small family type restaurant which is frequented by local people - definitely recommended. Istiklal caddesi and Taksim square is near (5-10 min walk). Nishantashi shopping district is 4 USD ride by taxi. When riding with taxi you shall refer to the Talimhane quarter and not trying to complicate your driver with the name of the street or the name of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “100% worth the money”
Reviews.Author: ikaros58
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel in all aspects starting from the friendly personell and then the amenities, the brand new spaceous rooms, the proper breakfast ,cleanliness and of course location. Worth the money 100%. Would stay again definitely.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel a bit expensive BUT totally worth the money”
Reviews.Author: MARTHA07
Reviews.Content: It was our second time in Turkey ,10 years after , and i had really bad experience from turkish hotels. Titanic Hotel was absolutely perfect. Near Taxim square ,Havas Bus & restaurants ,no noise and very very clean( hard thing to find in Turkey) and the bathroom was spacius and perfect. If you want some decent view ask for a room over the 6th floor .

Reviews.Title: “quiet, clean, comfortable with good spa”
Reviews.Author: toyiaPaphos
Reviews.Content: in quiet street easy walk from Taksim Square and to great shopping. Booked superior room and although no view ,beds bathroom space excellent and cleaned daily. Breakfast satisfactory except for coffee. Staff friendly on the whole. Bar on rooftop expensive. Spa and pool very good for inner city hotel and free. DOWNSIDE. tea coffee water extra. WORST THING was rip off of 50 EUROS from airport (average 40 lira - about half!) in taxi. This sum is paid directly to reception.

Reviews.Title: “perfect hotel”
Reviews.Author: johnkyvol
Reviews.Content: I have never seen the hotel 4 stars hotel like this.the moment you come in the hotel you feel very warm,rooms are very clean and decorated very interesting.I have been to istanbul 5 times and this is definetely my favorite hotel.hotel rooms are better than the photos in their web site,big and comportable.friendly staff.They recommended us to go some restaurant which we liked and turkish night show was fantastic.also citysighting with the tour they reccomended us was great.istanbul was cold when we were there bu actually we didn't complain.you should stay there once and you will understand what I mean.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MissPf
Reviews.Content: A few hiccups but it's definitely one of the best hotels in this district. It has a good breakfast and is surrounded by some excellent restaurants.

HotelInfo.Name: Titanic City Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Lamartin Cad No 47 | Taksim, Istanbul 34437, Turkey
